Posts.Content: I am at wits end and any info would be helpful. I had cancer in 2001. For treatment a lumpectomy, radiation, tomoxafin. 2007 a nother lumpectomy,benign. 2009 lumpectomy w/bi-lateral mystectomy, Enough already I've had at least 35 mammo's the people are nice but I'd rather see them at Walmart!. I have been off work since April I can't find any financial assistance because my pathology report was negative. I can't go back to work because I'm going through reconstruction and I lift on my job and I have to finish and heal from all my surgeries. I can't be the only personÂ who's going through this,,,My family has helped as much as they can
Posts.Title: Under Construction
